problem_statement: The payment-creation path has little or no automated test coverage, or existing tests are flaky, environment-dependent, or miss important edge cases. Failures in this path are only caught manually or in production. The business needs a repeatable test suite that runs in CI, covers the main and edge scenarios for this path, and does not change production behavior or introduce new production dependenciesâ€”so that regressions are caught before release and changes can be made with confidence.
